Class Account

java.lang.Object
com.mySTARS.Entities.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
StaffAccount, StudentAccount
public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Account class to define as a parent class for the child classes to inherit from. See: StudentAccount, StaffAcount

  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account​(java.lang.String loginID, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email)
      Constructor for making Account. Takes in the basic details of an account and return a valid Account object
      Parameters:
      loginID - The username used to access an account that is registered under MySTARS
      password - The password that is tagged respectively under the respective account.
      email - The email address that is tagged respectively under the respective account

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Formats the relevant details of the account to a custom string format: [Format] Login ID : Rights:
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • getAccountRights

      public DOMAIN getAccountRights()
      Returns account rights of current account
      Returns:
      return ADMIN or USER

    • setAccountRights

      public void setAccountRights​(DOMAIN accountRights)
      Set accounts rights based on specified settings
      Parameters:
      accountRights - possible DOMAIN: USER or ADMIN

    • getLoginID

      public java.lang.String getLoginID()
      Retrieve login details of current account
      Returns:
      Return loginID of current account

    • getEmail

      public java.lang.String getEmail()
      Retrieve email details of current account
      Returns:
      Return email of current account.

    • setEmail

      public void setEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      Set email details of current account
      Parameters:
      email - Sets the email of the current account based on the specified email

    • isAdmin

      public boolean isAdmin()
      Set account rights for current account.
      Returns:
      Return account rights based on specified DOMAIN: USER or ADMIN

    • checkLoginValid

      public boolean checkLoginValid​(java.lang.String loginID, java.lang.String hashedPassword)
      Checks if the account can be access given the login credentials.
      Parameters:
      loginID - The username used to access an account that is registered under MySTARS
      hashedPassword - The password that is tagged respectively under the respective account.
      Returns:
      Return a boolean that states whether the account can be accessed with the respective loginID and password credentials.
